SEARCH
Module fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner
Package fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.utilities

Class Constants

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.utilities.Constants
public final class Constants extends Object
The Constants class provides a set of constant values, configurations, and utility methods for managing supported languages, streaming providers, and generating URLs for movie data from The Movie Database (TMDb) API. It includes predefined language pairs, streaming provider IDs, and methods to retrieve provider-related data and formatted URLs for popular, top-rated, and filtered movies. This class cannot be extended since it is declared as final.
Author:
Make, ChatGPT(Javadoc comments)

    private final class 
    Constants.PROVIDERS
    Represents a collection of provider IDs for streaming services supported by the application.

  • Method Details

    • createLanguageList

      private List<javafx.util.Pair<String,String>> createLanguageList()
      Creates a list of language pairs containing language codes and their corresponding names.
      Returns:
      a list of pairs where each pair represents a language code and its name

    • getProviderIds

      private List<Integer> getProviderIds()
      Retrieves a list of streaming provider IDs by using reflection to access the static fields in the PROVIDERS class.
      Returns:
      a list of integers representing provider IDs

    • getProvidersString

      public String getProvidersString()
      Encodes the provider IDs into a URL-friendly string, where IDs are concatenated and separated by the '|' character.
      Returns:
      a URL-encoded string representing the provider IDs, or null if encoding fails

    • getProvidersString

      public String getProvidersString(List<Integer> list)
      Encodes a given list of provider IDs into a URL-friendly string, where IDs are concatenated and separated by the '|' character.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of provider IDs to encode
      Returns:
      a URL-encoded string representing the provider IDs, or null if encoding fails

    • getLanguages

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<String,String>> getLanguages()
      Retrieves the list of supported languages.
      Returns:
      a list of pairs where each pair represents a language code and its name

    • getPopularMoviesUrl

      public String getPopularMoviesUrl()
      Generates the URL for retrieving popular movies from TMDb, with the list of providers encoded as a URL parameter.
      Returns:
      a formatted URL string for popular movies

    • getTopRatedMoviesUrl

      public String getTopRatedMoviesUrl()
      Generates the URL for retrieving top-rated movies from TMDb, sorted by vote average and including only providers supported by the app.
      Returns:
      a formatted URL string for top-rated movies

    • getGenresUrl

      public String getGenresUrl()
      Retrieves the URL for fetching movie genres from TMDb.
      Returns:
      the URL string for fetching movie genres

    • getFilteredUrl

      public String getFilteredUrl(List<Integer> list)
      Generates a filtered URL for discovering movies from TMDb based on a specific list of providers.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of provider IDs to include in the URL
      Returns:
      a formatted URL string for filtered movies
